timeline.message: SONARJAVA-3389 S2698: Change issue location and message
SONARJAVA-3389 S2698: avoid duplicate and FP on assertion chain

timeline.bodyText: Do you think it's helpful for a user to talk of assertion chains and predicates here? So something along the lines of Add a message to this assertion chain before the predicate method. I am imagining that users could be confused when they are supposed to add a message to this assertion but before 'this method', because they may think that this method is the assertion. For me, things got a lot easier to keep track of when we started to speak about chains, predicates and subjects.
timeline.author: johann-beleites-sonarsource

replies.bodyText: Yes, make sense, we introduced this vocabulary exactly to improve the clarity, we should stick to it.
replies.author: quentin-jaquier-sonarsource
